        If this is a TCP SocketAdaptor, @see close

      • getInputStream

        public java.io.InputStream getInputStream()
                                   throws java.io.IOException
        Returns an input stream for this SocketAdaptor.

        If this is a TCP SocketAdaptor, @see getInputStream

        Returns:
        an input stream for reading bytes from this SocketAdaptor.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if an I/O error occurs when creating the input stream, the SocketAdaptor is closed, the SocketAdaptor is not connected.

      • getOutputStream

        public java.io.OutputStream getOutputStream()
                                     throws java.io.IOException
        Returns an output stream for this SocketAdaptor.

        If this is a TCP SocketAdaptor, @see getOutputStream

        Returns:
        an output stream for writing bytes to this SocketAdaptor.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if an I/O error occurs when creating the output stream or if the SocketAdaptor is not connected.
